casebody.data:
Louis FRIEDMAN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 21, 1924.) No. 82. Alexander S. Drescher and Harold J. Drescher, both of Brooklyn, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. Ralph G. Greene, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (William A. De Groot, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH and MANTON, Circuit Judges, and LEARNED HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
